alert.note: Alert for Western Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 19 at 10:30AM AKDT until March 19 at 7:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 60 to 70 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Aleutians. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A potent North Pacific low is forecast to lift across the Western Aleutians today. Winds, initially southerly in the afternoon, will shift out of the west by the early evening hours. The westerly shift is expected to bring the strongest winds before they quickly diminish with the exiting low Sunday night.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
